title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Helping out a fellow collector, they asked me post these up to get interest and auction them off.This is what I have been told about them:-There are about 3000+ total cards-Cards are included in sets that came out from 2016-2018-There are some rares, mythics, Japanese, and foil cards-1x Pre-built deck is included and can be see in the last 2 picturesPlease ask questions and I will try to get them answered *Can click on pictures for a larger viewAll cards:All cards side view: Foil cards:Japanese card:Deck, part 1:Deck, part 2:

comments.author: bill gator
comments.body: I would have interest in participating in an auction for some magic cards; I used to play as a kid, but never really had any cards of my own. It would surprise me if there wasn't others with a similar interest around here.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: bill gator on May 17, 2022, 04:59:31 PMI would have interest in participating in an auction for some magic cards; I used to play as a kid, but never really had any cards of my own. Very good. Any others interested?

comments.author: Ballhog69
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on May 19, 2022, 02:01:30 PMQuote from: bill gator on May 17, 2022, 04:59:31 PMI would have interest in participating in an auction for some magic cards; I used to play as a kid, but never really had any cards of my own. Very good. Any others interested?It takes 2 to have an auction! GL

comments.author: hub_cat
comments.body: Quote from: bill gator on May 17, 2022, 04:59:31 PMI would have interest in participating in an auction for some magic cards; I used to play as a kid, but never really had any cards of my own. It would surprise me if there wasn't others with a similar interest around here.I guess it depends on how big your imagination is imho. Building different kind of decks can be fun once you get into it. Players of all ages play, trade, & compete at the local card shops around the world. Artists and developers are still creating interesting monsters, lore, and abilities. The new set Kamigawa: Neon Dynasy for example is a Neo-Tokyo, Samurai, Cyberpunk themed set with amazing land art.A new format called Pioneer, came out 2019: https://magic.wizards.com/en/formats/pioneer

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Owner will consider trades:Silver/gold coinsMTG Pioneer format cards // Sets Return to Ravnica, forward.Sports cards:Mark McgwireFrank ThomasSammy SosaEdgar MartinezBerry BondsBo JacksonorHockey players like Joe Pavalski 2006-2019 or Dan Carcillo 2008-2011Any interest?
